attributes.action: Public inquiry to bring Banks and their Bankers responsible for defauding the U.K public to face a judge
attributes.additional_details: The revelation of banksters ( banker+gangster) getting away with fraud has not turned the tide of justice as not a single bankster has yet faced a judge. It is time for us, the people, who suffer the aftermath of the actions of banksters, to take action and demand justice. Although there are social warriors out there, the more voices the better. I want to do my bit for our community as I do on a daily basis. As far as having a Bankers facing justice Iceland leads the way. this a positve bench mark for us living and working in the U.K to inspire to.
